name: test_e2e_with_logs[363_CMD_FILE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_FILE_001` |
| **Name** | Shadow file read |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | file_manipulation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details
